note: Curated MCP servers and registries. Commands are not auto-configured; use agent.config.json > mcp_servers to add.

items.name: MCP Reference Servers (Official)
items.description: Official reference implementations (Everything, Fetch, Filesystem, Git, Memory, Sequential Thinking).

items.name: Awesome MCP Servers
items.description: Large community collection of MCP servers across categories.

items.name: MCP Example Remote Server
items.description: Hosted example server demonstrating MCP tools, resources, prompts, and sampling.

items.name: Context Awesome MCP Server
items.description: MCP server that exposes the Awesome Lists ecosystem.

items.name: GitHub MCP Server (Copilot)
items.description: GitHub MCP server for Copilot Chat, with toolsets controllable by policy.

notes: This catalog was annotated for the TypeScript port. Update server tooling paths as needed.
